title: Emerald and Diamond Haar Necklace with Pearl Drops
features: The necklace showcases an intricate floral and paisley design, studded with shimmering diamonds and complemented by verdant emerald center stones. The pearl drops add a touch of elegance. The piece is set with a modern take on the traditional nakshi style. Its design showcases delicate filigree and bead work that is often associated with Hyderabadi jewelry.
occasions: or grand celebrations. Suitable for muhurtham ceremonies or a sophisticated evening event.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends classic South Indian aesthetics with modern design principles. Its dazzling diamond and emerald pairing create a mesmerizing look that adds a luxurious statement to any outfit. A true testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship, its sophisticated design exudes opulence and finesse.
